metadata.title: CVE-2023-30772 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The Linux kernel before 6.2.9 has a race condition and resultantuse-after-free in drivers/power/supply/da9150-charger.c if a physicallyproximate attacker unplugs a device.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
